Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavaliers annihilated the Lakers with a 134-110 win.
Others: Donovan Mitchell had played four games before he took the court against the Lakers.
Donovan Mitchell had a 21-point game against the Toronto Raptors on October 23.
Donovan Mitchell scored 19 points on 38.1% shooting from the field and 12.5% from the 3-point line against the Detroit Pistons.
Donovan Mitchell scored his first 30-point game against the Washington Wizards.
Donovan Mitchell had 25 points in the game against the New York Knicks on October 28.
